captions.text:
- Radioactive Iguana sounds
like a really bad band name.

- Oh I like that one!
- Mmm!

- I'm more upset that I
ate the whole saltine.
Ghost in the Darkness Hot Sauce. (laughs)

- Oh god I'm so scared of
putting this in my mouth.

But it does kind of like
scratch a little bit more
like it's more painful than the other one.

- But I mean it's sweet
it's good I like this one.
- I think I like this one more.
- The letters are literally on fire.
- Well this doesn't look too bad.
I think my teeth are hurting.

- I just felt my sinuses
clear a little bit.

I know people from Trinidad
and they do not (bleep) around.

- And it has a scorpion
tail on it so it'll get ya.

- I feel like my tongue
is going to fall off
- I feel like this one isn't as bad, yet.

- Back of my throat! I put
it in the back of my throat!

- Warning, less than
one drop of this product
is absolutely and extremely seriously hot.
- Oh god damn this is getting...

This is a spice level that
I've never felt before.
It's going, it's traveling up my nose!
- Imagine when it gets to the butt hole
how much it's going to burn.

- I don't wanna think about
a couple hours from now.
